text: Joe Dancer was an American private detective television series starring, created, produced and narrated by Robert Blake. NBC released three television films that aired from 1981 to 1983. ==Plot== The stories of a hardboiled private detective, Joe Dancer. ==References== ==External links== * * * *Thrillingdetective.com Category:1980s American crime drama television series Category:American detective television series Category:1980s American mystery television series Category:American television films Category:American films Category:NBC original programming Category:1981 American television series debuts Category:1983 American television series endings Category:English- language television shows
title: Joe Dancer
